resources.string: Collecting data, please keep wearing GoBe.
The longer you wear GoBe, the more accurately it estimates the Activity and calorie Intake. We recommend wearing GoBe for %1$s per day.
You are wearing GoBe perfectly! Keep it up!
You are wearing GoBe for %1$s per day, so it has everything needed for an accurate estimation of your Activity and calorie Intake.
There is not enough data, don\'t forget to wear GoBe
You wear GoBe only for %1$s per day, so we do not have enough data for an accurate estimation of your daily activity and calorie intake, we recommend wearing GoBe for at least %2$s a day.
